attributes.description: Comprehensive process execution audit via Windows Security Event ID 4688, tracking script interpreters, LOLBins, and processes from suspicious locations with command line capture
attributes.query: SELECT time, datetime, source, provider_name, eventid, data FROM windows_events WHERE channel = 'Security' AND eventid = 4688 AND (data LIKE '%powershell.exe%' OR data LIKE '%cmd.exe%' OR data LIKE '%wscript.exe%' OR data LIKE '%cscript.exe%' OR data LIKE '%mshta.exe%' OR data LIKE '%rundll32.exe%' OR data LIKE '%regsvr32.exe%' OR data LIKE '%certutil.exe%' OR data LIKE '%bitsadmin.exe%' OR data LIKE '%msiexec.exe%' OR data LIKE '%\Temp\%' OR data LIKE '%\AppData\Local\Temp\%' OR data LIKE '%\Users\Public\%' OR data LIKE '%\ProgramData\%') ORDER BY time DESC;
